import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react' import DocumentTitle from 'react-document-title' import NotificationsContainer from 'shared/notifications' import Button from 'shared/button' import Logo from 'shared/logo' import Modal from 'shared/modal' import { handleModals, handleURL } from 'utils' import ViewDoc from 'shared/viewDoc' import MenuOptions from './utils/menuOptions' import SessionStore from 'stores/session' import DiagnosisStore from 'stores/diagnosis' import RegisterActions from 'actions/register' const getCurrentState = () => { return { user: SessionStore.getCurrentEntity(), diagnosis: DiagnosisStore.getDiagnosis(), url: DiagnosisStore.getUrl() } } class DiagnosticReady extends Component { state = { isModalDiagnosticOpen: false, width: 0, height: 0, ...getCurrentState() } componentDidMount () { window.addEventListener('resize', this.updateDimensions) this.updateDimensions() DiagnosisStore.addChangeListener(this._onChange) const { user } = this.state RegisterActions.askDiagnosisStatus(user.user_id) } componentWillUnmount () { DiagnosisStore.removeChangeListener(this._onChange) window.removeEventListener('resize', this.updateDimensions) } _onChange = () => { this.setState(getCurrentState()) } updateDimensions = () => { this.setState({ width: window.outerWidth, height: window.outerHeight }) } renderModalChangePayment = () => { const { isModalDiagnosticOpen, url } = this.state return ( handleModals('isModalDiagnosticOpen', this)} noFooter isAlert isBigger noBackground >
